00010 // http://www.unknownroad.com/rtfm/VisualStudio/warningC4251.html

00013 #pragma warning( disable : 4251 )
00014 #endif

00050       DataStream& operator <<(bool c);

00054       DataStream& operator <<(double c);

00062       // read operations

00087    private:
00088       template<typename T, typename IterT>
00089       void IncrementPointer(IterT& iter)
00090       {
00091          iter += sizeof(T);
00092       }
00093 
00094       template<typename T, typename IterT>
00095       void DecrementPointer(IterT& iter)
00096       {
00097          iter -= sizeof(T);
00098       }
00099 
00102       template<typename T>
00103       void WriteAlgorithm(T t)
00104       {
00105          char* ch = reinterpret_cast<char*>( &t );
00106          DoFlip( ch , sizeof(T) );
00107          DoWrite( ch , sizeof(T) );
00108          IncrementPointer<T>( _write_pos );
00109       }
00110 
00113       template<typename T>
00114       void ReadAlgorithm(T& t)
00115       {
00116          char ch[sizeof(T)];
00117          DoRead( ch , sizeof(T) );
00118          DoFlip( ch , sizeof(T) );
00119          t = *reinterpret_cast<T*>( ch );
00120          IncrementPointer<T>( _read_pos );
00121       }
00122 
00124       void DoFlip(char* buf, size_t bufsize);
00125 
00126       void DoWrite(const char* buf, size_t bufsize);
00127 
00128       void DoRead(char* ch, size_t bufsize);
00129 
00130 
00131       typedef std::vector<char> BufferType;
00132       //const BufferType& GetBuffer() const;
00133 
00134       BufferType _buffer;
00135 
00137       size_t _read_pos;
00138       size_t _write_pos;
00139 
00141       Endian _stream_endian;
00142 
00144       Endian _machine_endian;
00145    };
00146 }
